
{{Client function}}
This function retrieves the analog control state of a ped, as set by [[/setPedAnalogControlState.md|setPedAnalogControlState]].

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">float getPedAnalogControlState ( ped thePed, string controlName )</syntaxhighlight>

===Required Arguments===
*'''thePed:''' The ped you wish to retrieve the control state of.
*'''controlName:''' The control. See [[/control names.md|control names]] for a list of possible controls.

===Returns===
Returns a float between 0 ( full release ) and 1 ( full push ) indicating the amount the control is pushed.
